text:
Important to express gratitude when a job is so well done, like getting your first #COVID19 #vaccine.

210409 15:45 First Covid-19 Vaccine #AstraZeneca in Cedarwood Unit, Connolly Hospital. 

Incredible kindness & professionalism that worked like clockwork. Thank you. @HSELive https://t.co/yLcSHxtZsJ
